name: Counter-Strike 2
desc: For over two decades, Counter-Strike has offered an elite competitive experience, one shaped by millions of players from across the globe. And now the next chapter in the CS story is about to begin. This is Counter-Strike 2.
Help Mox break out from his unjust inprisonment. Navigate through a hazardous, futuristic city and outrun your pursuer to reach an off-world colony in this 2D precision-platformer!
name: Unbound

desc: Begin your career at the Multiversal Institute for the Rhythmic Arts (MIRA), an interdimensional school where music, magic, and friendship collide.Â  Encore! is a rhythm game and visual novel hybrid, where you must curate a band from wacky characters to win Battle of the Bands!
name: Encore!

desc: Super-B is a free-to-play multiplayer game with AAA 3D graphics, where players become toy characters in a brick-built world. It features 12+ game modes at launch, offering fast-paced action and social interaction.
name: Super-B
Escape Game: Camper 2
desc: An escape game set inside a camper trailer. Search for items, gather clues, solve puzzles, and find your way out in this short, casual experience.

name: The Dead Roam Free - Episode 1
desc: Follow Bob Segatti â€” private eye, local fixer, and newly turned zombie â€” in his biggest case yet. A film-noir tale of treachery, revenge, and pixel-splattered mayhem. Itâ€™s Snake with guns, dames, and a whole lot of brains to eat.

name: Wuthering Waves
desc: Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG with a high degree of freedom. You wake from your slumber as Rover, joined by a vibrant cast of Resonators on a journey to reclaim your lost memories and change the world.

name: ç•°ãƒæ•…ãƒª-Isolated Hours-
desc: A 3D horror game where your only goal is to finish your workâ€¦ and survive the night. Unnatural anomalies creep into the office as you complete your tasks. Can you make it to the end of your shift alive.

name: REAL MOON
desc: Explore a precisely recreated lunar surface built from real data and a JAXA-backed simulation.

name: Where Winds Meet
desc: Where Winds Meet is an epic Wuxia open-world action-adventure RPG set in ancient China at the tenth century. Players will assume the role of a young sword master as they embark on a journey to uncover the mysteries of their own identity. Let the wind carry your legend on an epic journey to the East!

name: bygone snow
desc: When the world ends, who will you spend your final hours with? A visual novel for the GBA.

name: The Ice Cream Culprit
desc: Let your girlfriend know (or not) about the culprit who ate her ice cream.

name: Truck Company
desc: TruckCompany - is a strategic game in which you develop your transport enterprise, the aim of which is to create a great consortium with other players and compete with others for the title of the best businessmen

name: Letherfall
desc: Letherfall is a first-person horror video game with Lovecraftian elements: the player must make their way through monstrous entities and intricate puzzles while exploring the abandoned village of Letherfall. Some nightmares donâ€™t fade. Theyâ€™re just waiting for you to open the wrong door.

name: Dumbubu
desc: You will own nothing and be happy. You can't afford a house, but you can afford Dumbubu Desktop Pet. Interact with Dumbubu and receive random skins tradeable on Steam Market.

name: Dave's Wrecking Yard 3D
desc: It's the late 1990s all over again and you find yourself the owner of Dave's Wrecking Yard.Â Earn cash by filling various parts orders by phone, internet, & walk-in customers. Enjoy working at your own pace while ordering pizzas and chugging sodas.

name: Love Limit
desc: Your blind date invades Earth!?

notes: Only read the game and choose the ending.
name: Mobile Murder Mystery
desc: Follow the story of the Unseen Narrator, whose repetitive life falls apart when their co-worker decides to quit on a whim.

name: emerald
desc: what do you fear?

name: In Our Parlor
desc: In Our Parlor is a short, horror walking simulator. The player must make their way through a mysterious manor to unfold the story, find the parlor, and escape this nightmare. Navigate a series of dark set pieces and follow the music to discover the path forward.

name: Soulcrossed
desc: A visual novel with SRPG battles that will test both your mind and heart.

name: PoligonVR
desc: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

name: Dota Underlords
desc: Hire a crew and destroy your rivals in this new strategy battler set in the world of Dota. Introducing Season One: Explore White Spire and earn rewards on the Battle Pass. Pick from several different game modes, play on your own or with friends, and take advantage of crossplay on PC and mobile.

name: Dota 2
desc: Every day, millions of players worldwide enter battle as one of over a hundred Dota heroes. And no matter if it's their 10th hour of play or 1,000th, there's always something new to discover. With regular updates that ensure a constant evolution of gameplay, features, and heroes, Dota 2 has taken on a life of its own.

name: Artifact
desc: Artifact now features two games: Artifact Classic, the original Dota 2 trading card game, and Artifact Foundry, a special edition with streamlined gameplay, new cards, new single-player content, and an improved new player experience.

name: Alien Swarm
desc: Co-operative multiplayer game and complete code base available for free.

name: Team Fortress 2
desc: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

name: Death Drive
desc: Death Drive is a road trip visual novel inspired by classic American Gothic fiction.

name: Shrouded Depths
desc: Stranded in the fog of the murky waters on an isolated ferry with nothing but your harpoon gun, you feel the overwhelming presence of something within the misty mangrove. Your vessel is stopped dead and it is up to you with the assistance of the Captain to get the boat back up and running again.

name: Welcome To The Dark Place
desc: The train is the only escape.

name: Sunday School
desc: You are trapped in a Sunday School, plagued by eerie childlike hallucinations. Observe your surroundings carefully to spot anomalies, and descend deeper only when youâ€™re certain itâ€™s safe.

name: Yukiã€Œæ¸…é†’æ¢¦ã€
desc: Explore an abandoned school where memories linger longer than the living. Uncover the mystery of your best friendâ€™s disappearance. Dodge bullets.

name: FOR GOD'S SAKE, HELP HIM!
desc: FOR GOD'S SAKE, HELP HIM! is a tiny, surreal first-person art "game" about what it's like. your goal is singular and simple: try to help him, however you can... if you can. that's a tall order considering you're both in a blank void and he's being crushed over and over.

name: Fear The Unknown - Dave Story
desc: This story is one of the rare accounts we've managed to document a tale from the few who have encountered UFOs and lived to tell the tale. Dave considers himself lucky, and maybe you will be too, if you dare to face the unknown and survive.

name: Aker Fern 2
desc: Take on the role of Dan Tern, a young man in whom the consciousness of MikoÅ‚aj Fernâ€”a man from five hundred years agoâ€”has awakened. Discover the mysteries of the past, confront the curse that haunts him, and conclude a story that never reached its end.

name: Goodbye
desc: A story-driven interactive game about a sweet old lady and a mysterious figure. Follow her daily routine by completing a simple task list, until itâ€™s time to make an unusual deal with the One Whoâ€™s Waiting. And please, do not say â€œgoodbye.â€

name: Headspace
desc: A NSFW Adventure-RPG where you either subdue or seduce the various denizens of your imagination, all while trying to remember who you are. Can you escape the confines of your Headspace?

name: The Night Is Long
desc: The Night Is Long is a short first-person horror game where a grieving man follows a ghostly vision into an abandoned mansion. Uncover dark secrets, survive atmospheric horrors, and face your past through exploration, puzzles, and subtle scares.

name: BIRDHOUSE
desc: A short narrative-driven horror game made in RPGmaker featuring hand-drawn graphics and animated cutscenes. Players navigate the house and its backyard, interacting with the environment and collecting key items to progress the story.

name: You And I
desc: "You And Iâ€ is an interactive film where you guide Mark, lost deep in the woods with his friend, Ace. However the more time the two spend together, the stranger the two become.

name: Yes, No, Goodbye
desc: Yes, No, Goodbye is a haunting word game where you play as an exorcist attempting to send off a spirit clinging to their old apartment. Unscramble the truth and seek out solace for the dead.

name: Road Trip to the End of the World
desc: Road Trip to the End of the World is a visual novel about the death of a friendship. When Andy and her imaginary friend Fishy set off on a road trip to crash their ex-best friendâ€™s wedding, will they know when to hit the brakes?
developer: Shark and Pelican Games, Alex M. Lee

name: The Wind and the Wisp
desc: A 3D adventure game about blowing into the microphone. Join the Wind, a non-corporeal petal breeze, and the Wisp, a little white ghost with a red ribbon, on their journey to repair a mysterious broken garden.

name: Stomach
desc: STOMACH is a first-person survival horror cooking game located in a cruise ship with PS1 inspired graphics to capture that retro horror feeling. Your task is to read a food order, search for food ingredients, and make it back safely to the kitchen to cook your ingredients before time runs out.

name: The Man in the Park 2: The Second Man in the Park
desc: It's been so long. You've tried to forget, however tonight you must walk through the park again. Now there are two men in the park. Will you help one, or both? Who will you trust?

name: Wanderness
desc: Capture stunning moments with your trusty camera and immerse yourself in a soothing, zen-inspired world that calms your mind and eases anxiety.

desc: Welcome to Kimochii Classroom! A slice-of-life visual novel with stunning visuals, a beautiful soundtrack, and an immersive story. Who will you meet first?

name: boyfriend or cake??
desc: alternatively: caring romantic partner or delicious confectionery dessert?

name: The Man in the Park
desc: You see a man in the park on your walk home. Will you help him?

name: BETWEEN
desc: "May you leave no regrets in this journey of life." ã€ An independent game about death. Explore the past lives in an atmospheric graveyard.

name: Beneath The Cherry Trees
desc: "There are bodies buried beneath the cherry trees!" A Japanese poetic literature "Beneath The Cherry Trees(1928)" by MotojirÅ Kajii starts from a shocking sentence. We made a short Visual Novel based on this story with Illustrator Kotori's watercolor works, beautiful photographs, and imposing musics.

name: Dependency Psychological Test
desc: A narrative-driven point-and-click game that explores dependent personality through interactive psychological testing. Make choices, build relationships, and discover how your behavior shapes your mental assessment.

desc: Honkai Impact 3rd - Ultimate anime action made real! HD cel-shading, infinite combos, explosive feedback... Experience next-gen real-time action! An original tale told across media, immersive stage events, star-studded voice cast... Become part of the legend!

name: Dilemma: The Game
desc: In this 2D, Point and Click, choose-your-own-adventure experience. You will pick a way to respond to dilemmas .Answer non-sensical thought questions and unearth what happens from your choices.

name: Biophobia
desc: A woman is violated by a man. In a final act of rebellion to preserve her humanity, she takes control and opens her stomach. Unable to finish what she started she waits for you, and asks you not to look away.

name: Replicomica
desc: A short, atmospheric experience set inside a handcrafted dream. You are a small, solitary citizen drifting through augmented memories. Boot up your LonelyOS and let the robots guide you.

name: Terminus
desc: Paris, 1968. As the city sinks into social unrest, a far darker threat rises from deep underground. Charles Mercier, a former SOLDIER recruited by a secret organization, is sent into the METRO tunnels to prevent an IMMINENT CATASTROPHE.

name: The Falling Star
desc: The Falling Star is a first-person exploration and narrative-driven walking simulator. Following the mother's last wish, the girl embarks on a journey in a dream to uncover the story of her missing auntâ€™s past.

name: Hollowing
desc: Play as a student who is alone outside. He is constantly under academic and social pressure. As anxiety and loneliness accumulated, he began to notice something unusual. In this inescapable fear, he must find the answer... or be consumed by it.

name: Voice of the Ocean
desc: Voice of the Ocean is a single-player adventure about a lost world, and the echoes of a forgotten past. Use your voice to sing ancient melodies and explore a world lost beneath the waves. Dive into the depths to uncover the power within your song and learn why you may be the last of your kind.

name: The River
desc: A short story point-and-click visual novel about the afterlife.

name: Infinite Blue
desc: Discover an immersive ocean Eco-Sim where you can be almost any animal under the sea! From a tiny seahorse to a massive blue whale, experience the endless circle of life in a massive world of reefs, shipwrecks, and hidden wonders.

name: Shelter from the Storm
desc: Rain lashes down soaking you to the bone, you take shelter in a seemingly abandoned house. Navigate through the rooms solving puzzles and trying to escape in this short point & click adventure game.

name: Contraindication
desc: Your end is my beginning. A short psychological visual novel with exploration and puzzle elements... it already lays shattered.

name: This is the last time
desc: This is the Last Time is a minimalist first-person narrative game with a dark and heavy atmosphere.

name: Greed's Grub
desc: You donâ€™t remember exactly what you did, just that it had to have been real bad, if this was your punishment. Five days of community service in this greasy, rotting excuse for a burger joint. Just five days, and youâ€™re free. Thatâ€™s all you have to endure.

name: PEXIT 8
desc: Penguin Ã— Exit 8 : A unique combination Escape from the endlessly looping hallway. If you find an anomaly, choose YES PEN. If there is no anomaly, choose NO PEN. All anomalies contain penguin elements. Penguins are after you.

name: Banshee
desc: The game is about escaping from a house where â€œBansheeâ€, a frightening looking fairy, wanders around, exploring the surroundings and using the items found to escape.

name: Half-Life 2 RTX
desc: Re-live the groundbreaking, critically acclaimed Half-Life 2 like never before, reimagined with RTX Remix. Featuring full ray tracing, remastered assets, and DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation, this DLC is free for Half-Life 2 owners.

name: TRIBE NINE
desc: Defy the madness. Brutal Action RPG "TRIBE NINE" Set in the nation of Neo Tokyo, where absolute madness rules. Here, teens face life-or-death battles, constantly resisting the harsh and unjust worldâ€”all in pursuit of reclaiming their lost freedom and dreams.

name: Black Reliquary
desc: Black Reliquary is a challenging overhaul mod for Darkest Dungeon, one which makes sweeping changes to gameplay, adds a new story, a new setting, new narration, new music, new enemies, and so very much more. Embark into the distant east and uncover the ancient secrets of the Black Reliquary!

name: Poppy Playtime
desc: You must stay alive in this horror/puzzle adventure. Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility... and don't get caught.

name: ReDo
desc: A supernatural horror visual novel game where your choices decide if you and your friends see the light of day again or not. Use your sleuthing skills with point and click mechanics to battle horrifying creatures of the night that haunt an abandoned school building and earn your title of "Exorcist"!

notes: My First video on my YouTube Channel :)
name: PockeDate! - Pocket Dating Simulator
desc: Your Pocket-Sized Dating Simulator! Every launch brings a new date with unique dialogues! Spend endless hours with your adorable, love-struck virtual girlfriend.

name: Kagura Survivors: Endless Night
desc: Something is wrong in the Kaguraverse. An anomaly is creating tears in space-time and causing parallel worlds to converge! It falls upon Kagura-chan, the vessel of the Goddess's will, to get to the bottom of this crisis and return order to the various universes.

name: World of Warships
desc: Immerse yourself in thrilling naval battles and assemble an armada of over 600 ships from the first half of the 20th century â€” from stealthy destroyers to gigantic battleships. Change the look of your ship, choose upgrades to suit your play style, and go into battle with other players!

name: Warframe
desc: Awaken as an unstoppable warrior and battle alongside your friends in this story-driven free-to-play online action game

name: War Thunder
desc: War Thunder is the most comprehensive free-to-play, cross-platform, MMO military game dedicated to aviation, armoured vehicles, and naval craft, from the early 20th century to the most advanced modern combat units. Join now and take part in major battles on land, in the air, and at sea.

name: Apex Legendsâ„¢
desc: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

name: Marvel Rivals
desc: Marvel Rivals is a Super Hero Team-Based PVP Shooter! Assemble an all-star Marvel squad, devise countless strategies by combining powers to form unique Team-Up skills and fight in destructible, ever-changing battlefields across the continually evolving Marvel universe!

name: LoveCraft
desc: Welcome to LoveCraft - home to interesting people, hot parties, exploration and fulfilling relationships! Create your world, from a unique persona to your exciting adventures.

name: MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE
desc: Pick your favorite character, team up and fight to be the last ones standing in the new 24-player Battle Royale free to play game "MY HERO ULTRA RUMBLE"!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Rebound
desc: 3on3 FreeStyle: Rebound allows players to work with their teammates to pull off rim-shaking slam dunks, awe-inspiring alley-oops, flashy no-look passes, and clutch outside shots which breaks the heart of the opposing team in competitive games filled with the joy and energy of street basketball.

name: Crush Crush
desc: Welcome to Crush Crush - the Idle Dating Sim! Meet, flirt, and fall in love with a motley cast of girls in this heartfelt and hilarious game.

name: Drawful 2
desc: For 3-8 players and an audience of thousands! Your phones or tablets are your controllers! The game of terrible drawings and hilariously wrong answers.

name: Doki Doki Literature Club!
desc: The Literature Club is full of cute girls! Will you write the way into their heart? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Conspiracy Girls
desc: Conspiracy Girls is a short visual novel about cute and funny girls who around exposing conspiracies, and get into all sorts of trouble doing so!

name: SEXTS
desc: Let's start typing!Discover gorgeous hentai women in this typing game!Play and unlock tons of pics of the most sublime waifus!!!

notes: Test your mouse with banana on the screen.
name: Banana
desc: Banana is a clicker Game, in which you click a Banana! In Banana you click the Banana to gain even more Bananas! Every 3 hours, you get dropped a banana. Each banana is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Kokurase Episode 1
desc: The Kokurase gang, also known as Cupidâ€™s Helpers, is out to help freshman Sakura woo Yoshimitsu, a popular senior with every other girl in school vying for his heart. Switch between members to bring these two lovebirds together in an intertwining tale.

name: First Snow
desc: Having moved away from her friends and family to attend community college, Allison Merlo is a fresh student struggling with the day to day challenges of life.

name: DEAD OR ALIVE Xtreme Venus Vacation
DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters
desc: The free version of the final word in fighting entertainment - DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round!
developer: Team NINJA, KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.

name: Cave Crawler
desc: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.

name: Narcissu 1st & 2nd
desc: This is a story of disease and suffering; of medication and adverse effects; of thoracotomy scars and cellular poisons; of the living who cannot help but to die and of the dying who cannot help but to live; of a resting place other than "on 7F" or "at home".

name: Beat of Rebellion
desc: Be the voice out of the choir! Beat of Rebellion is an isometric rhythm-based Hack & Slash. Follow the Beat, create your own Melodies and unleash devastating combos to fight against a totalitarian regime in a cyberpunk city.

name: Operation: Outbreak
desc: Your squad's vehicle exploded during a patrol, and you're the only survivor. The enemy is unusual this time. A virus has turned the city into a warzone of the undead. Get to the exfil in time or die trying. A free-to-play short and intense FPS zombie survival horror game.

name: Modularity
desc: Modularity is a resource management builder game where the player stitches together flesh and metal in creative ways to construct bigger and greater amalgamations.
developer: William Skou Heidemann - Tech Lead, Tim Meincke Bramming - Programmer, Jakob Ehlers - Programmer, Christina Desypri - Lead Game Designer, Lykke Legendre Dahl - UX Designer, Nicholas Demetroulakos - Producer

name: Stories Adrift: Wake - Prologue
desc: As the new owner of a book boat, you are entrusted with returning a single page of a book and embarks on a journey through a world both mysterious and familiar. By solving intricate puzzles and piecing together scattered clues, you uncover the truth of the world - and of yourself.

name: Path of the Tank
desc: Can you challenge oblivion itself?

name: Lokko
desc: Lokko is a bouncy, action-packed 3D platformer where YOU create the adventure! In Lokko, players race to deliver hot pizzas around the globe while battling the sinister Goobol fast-food corporation.

name: 12, Memory Lane
desc: Explore the shifting manor of the enigmatic Henri Villemaine and uncover the truth behind his familyâ€™s sudden disappearance. Bend reality to recreate the scenes from his diary and expose long-buried secrets. What if your role in this case went beyond that of a simple investigator?

name: Fallout Shelter
desc: Fallout Shelter puts you in control of a state-of-the-art underground Vault from Vault-Tec. Build the perfect Vault, keep your Dwellers happy, and protect them from the dangers of the Wasteland.

name: Brawlhalla
desc: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over sixty Legends.

name: Albion Online
desc: Albion Online is a fantasy sandbox MMORPG featuring a player-driven economy, classless combat system, and intense PvP battles. Explore a vast open world full of danger and opportunity. Grow your wealth, forge alliances, and leave your mark on the world of Albion.

name: Bongo Cat
desc: Bongo cat needs your help. Bongo cat needz more hatz!!! Every time you press a key, Bongo cat will punch your taskbar. Type, click, play, work to collect more points. Which hats will you find?

name: Supermarket Together
desc: The multiplayer supermarket has arrived to your neighbourhood for free! Stock your shop space, unlock perks and franchises, hire employees or chase those pesky shoplifters. The more players, the more action!

name: Pixel Gun 3D: PC Edition
desc: The legendary mobile multiplayer FPS Pixel Gun 3D comes to PC! Experience an enhanced world of colorful, blocky action. Featuring dozens of game modes and maps, 1500+ guns plus cross-platform multiplayer and progression.

name: Star Trek Online
desc: In Star Trek Online, the Star Trek universe appears for the first time on a truly massive scale. Players take the captain's chair as they command their own starship and crew. Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before.

name: Cell to Singularity - Evolution Never Ends
desc: The epic story of evolution, technology, humanity, and dinosaurs is yours to tap.

name: Shakes and Fidget
desc: Shakes & Fidget is a hilarious fantasy role-playing satire and at the same time, an award-winning RPG! Sounds crazy? With over 50 million enthusiastic players, it ranks among the most celebrated online role-playing games worldwide!

name: Trackmania
desc: Welcome to the Club! Grab the wheel and play TrackmaniaÂ® for FREE now.

name: RISK: Global Domination
desc: Take over the world in RISK: Global Domination, the iconic strategy board game with 100+ original and classic maps and millions of players

name: Starbrew Station
desc: Build the galaxy's most efficient coffee production outpost in this sci-fi idle game. Recruit 33 unique alien workers, automate operations across 6 industrial decks, and push your station to the limit during Rush Hour surges. Prestige and expand through multiple progression systems.

name: Low Poly Mouse Game
desc: 2-4 Sneaky and squeaky low-poly mice face off against a lone cat in the battlefield of a human house. Mice use proximity chat to communicate with other players, while the cat hunts their noises. Will the mice perform enough tasks to destroy the house, or will the cat defeat enough mice to save it?

name: Jurassic Wrap
desc: Rescue baby dino eggs in a family-friendly adventure made by a father & son duo. In Jurassic Wrap, your goal is simple: save the baby dino eggs and make it safely to the exit portal. Along the way youâ€™ll leap, dodge, and use clever screen-wrapping mechanics to outsmart threats through each level.

name: Tiny Crate
desc: Tiny Crate is a Crate Chucking Action Puzzle Game ! Leap over spikes and stack up crates to reach the portal in each puzzle . Collect hidden musical notes (-:

name: Putrid Snow 2: House of Yule
desc: Trapped alone in a mansion with relentless holiday monsters, you must scavenge for presents to find weapons and traps. Outsmart the AI, manage your inventory, and turn the holiday hunter into the hunted. Free to play!

name: MimiBird
desc: MimiBird is a crafting exploration game set in a place full of colorful nature, where you must craft different tools after collecting various materials in order to capture birds and take them to your grandmother.

name: Gilroy's Grove
desc: Step into the forest where your shovel is both your weapon and lifeline. Fight back against twisted forest creatures, claim their corrupted seeds, and bring them to your farm and grow your weapons. Restore the forest plant by plant, Will you break the curse, or will the forest claim you too?

name: MINOS: Home A-Labyrinth
desc: A free MINOS spin-off inspired by everyone's favorite holiday film. Build festive traps, defend a snow-covered home from clumsy intruders, and unleash winter-grade mischief in this legally distinct seasonal homage.

name: Garganta
desc: 'Garganta' is a 3D Platformer influenced by Tsutomu Nihei's works. Embody Servo, an android racing to neutralise a device that'll engulf the Universe in innumerable singularities. Encounter peculiar characters and unveil secret plots designed by an AI, maddened by incomprehensible horrors.

name: Love and Sex: First Base
desc: Become roommates with two gorgeous girls and explore the largest free hand-drawn 18+ dating sim ever. Level up your stats, sharpen your game, and roam the city to seduce 5 unique waifus & find your soulmate(s). Play your cards right, and your days will be filled with nothing but loveâ€¦ and sex!

name: BrownDogGames
desc: A low-poly universe of mini-games! Build, blast, defend, and duel across multiple worldsâ€”all inside the BrownDogGames hub.

name: Dollemma
desc: An asymmetrical multiplayer horror game with a unique appealing aesthetic. Join up to 4 friends and work together to escape the dollhouse! Or play as the Hunter and shatter the dolls before they can escape.

name: Undeads
desc: Embark on a risky but exciting journey through the world of Undeads. Search for weapons, armor, supplies and medicine. Survive or hunt survivors. Enjoy unique matches, sell your loot, and fight bloody and challenging battles against the background of the zombie apocalypse!

name: Lantern Light (DEMO)
desc: Lantern Light is an action horror puzzle game where you explore a decrepit manor and face twisted monsters. While clinging to the fragile glow of your lantern, the only thing keeping you from madness. Keep the light alive, preserve your sanity, and confront your deepest fears in Lantern Light.
developer: Ryan Gibeau, Bastian Farrera, Nithin Sathiya, Hipton, Mya Zayas, Rachel Gates, Tarik Baghdadi, Emily Joaquim, Gabrielle Arabe, Eduardo Huamani

name: The Menace Below
desc: Short, challenging, hand-drawn cinematic platformer about escaping from the lair of evil ratmen.

name: Seoul Bridge
desc: You are trapped on the Seoul Bridge. Whether you move toward the exit or return to the entrance, you remain trapped on the Seoul Bridge. Observe your surroundings carefully and find a way to escape.

name: Bound Between Desks
desc: A mystical visual novel where ordinary school life intertwines with mysterious phenomena. Every decision you make could lead to uncovering secrets... or plunge you into even greater uncertainty.

name: Denpa Nightmares
desc: No matter how long youâ€™re gone, there will always be a girl waiting for you in the same place. This is a story about forgetting, and about waiting. After countless restarts and countless memories lostâ€¦ how long will you stay with her this time?

name: BongBongCapy
desc: The super cute capybara will stay with you. Every time you tap the keyboard or click the mouse, it'll mimic the same taps to accumulate merit points. Merit lets you randomly draw diverse looks to switch freely. Don't hesitateâ€”add a super versatile capybara to your desktop now!

name: Drunk Driving Simulator
desc: In Drunk Driving Simulator you drive down the highway while getting drunk, making driving more difficult as time goes on

name: Endless Forest
desc: You find yourself in an unending forest, trees as far as the imagination can reach. How did you get here? Where even are you? At this point you are really only left with one option, chop trees and hone your senses as you venture through the mysterious forest.

name: The Backrooms Deluxe 2
desc: A roguelite multiplayer Backrooms game that bases itself on The Backrooms Deluxe's levels and expands on the mechanics, levels, networking and enemy AI.

name: Cube Dodger 3D
desc: Cube Dodger 3D is a fast, neon arcade runner. Slide along a glowing highway, dodge smarter and faster cubes, charge your shield, unlock ships, roads and enemy skins, and chase brutal score-based Steam achievements

name: THE SCREAM OF DARKNESS
desc: the scream of darkness is a first person psychological horror with multiple endings, it shows the story about one guy that gets his whole life ruined in days. can you discover the truth?

name: Rogue Slots
desc: A deckbuilding roguelike, with a slot machine as your Dungeon Master. Spin to strike in a roguelike where every action comes from your custom slot machine. Load the reels with weapons, coins, and cursed relics, then let fate drive the fight.

name: Land Run
desc: An original single-play card game set in the 'LandRun' of the Western Pioneering Era. A fierce psychological battle using cards and luck, the game is turned upside down with just one card.

name: Number Factory
desc: Build the ultimate number production empire! Automate generators, unlock powerful upgrades, and prestige for permanent bonuses. Compete on global leaderboards and watch your numbers grow to infinity in this addictive idle incremental game.

name: Gravity Game
desc: Gravity Game is a puzzle-style infinite physics simulation. You are tasked with escaping your home planet, and reaching the goal at another! This game uses real Newtonian Physics in a simple 2D simulation, as a way to help people visually understand the mechanics.

name: Samburger's oddballs
desc: A block boomin, cannon blastin, heart grabbin combo! play games such as: Anncceleration: Collect hearts while you race against the clock in multiple levels! Athena's higher wire: Dodge cannons and collect stars for a high score! Boomin blocks: Line up combos in a puzzle shooter!

name: The Whittled Horse
desc: A boy named Thomas and his friend Evey are trusted to deliver a package. Little do they know there is a force stalking them, and what they carry will decide the future.

name: Ear Training
desc: A chill ear training game to help you get better at recognizing notes, chords, and intervals. Simple, useful, and made with love.

name: Journey to Shambhala
desc: Embark on an epic quest in "Journey to Shambhala," a 3D Action-Adventure Hindi game that takes you deep beneath ancient temples in search of the mystical city of Shambhala. You must navigate through 5 challenging stages, each filled with obstacles to unveil the hidden pathway to the legendary city.

name: Elemental Battle: Eclipse
desc: An anime-style arena fighter with elemental powers, unique characters, and combo-heavy combat. Built by a solo developer, featuring striking visuals, unique abilities, responsive controls, and fast local multiplayer battles packed with style and energy for all skill levels and endless replayability.

name: Heist Royale
desc: Heist Royale is a chaotic multiplayer heist game where strategy, sabotage, and speed determine who escapes with the most cash! Race to rob a heavily secured bank, outsmart rivals, and dodge securityâ€”all while pulling off hilarious tricks and betrayals. Work together or backstab your way to victory!

name: Price of Obsession
desc: Price of Obsession is a choice-driven narrative game featuring multiple endings, where your decisions determine who lives, who dies, and who you might fall in love with.

name: Hypercar Evolution 2025
desc: The first-ever true MMO hypercar racing game is here! Play with up to 39 friends!

name: TCSTRIKERS5
desc: This is the biggest news title of 2025. A cute bullet-hell shooter is now available. The game features cool and futuristic visuals and active gameplay.

name: Pingorile
desc: A retro-style 2D platformer where you play as a penguin collecting yellow budgies to fulfill his dream of flying. Explore diverse levels, jump past obstacles, and enjoy a colorful, music-filled adventure.

name: Campoca
desc: Enter Campoca, where feel-good activities and delightful interactions are yours to enjoy completely for free! Collect joyful memories and turn your campsite into a charming, heartwarming retreat!
developer: Emma FagerstrÃ¶m, Elsa Ekberg, David SÃ¶derstrÃ¶m

name: Never Immortal
desc: Never Immortal is a 2D multiplayer topdown shooter with two different exciting gamemodes. Battle with other players against either hordes of zombies in the Wave Survival gamemode, or against each other in the Zombie Mystery gamemode.

name: Once Upon a Shell
desc: Once Upon a Shell is a roguelike racing game of ridiculous speed and wild upgrades. As a tortoise, use your shell to your advantage and slide downhill to generate speed. Build movement combos between races and prove that even a tortoise can lift The Hare Cup.

name: Cybersoul
desc: Deckbuilding Card Game meets Incremental Data Mining. Command 3+ dystopian factions & 100+ cards in this acid-soaked Cyberpunk Card Battler. Unleash glitch-fueled combos, gamble in a corrupted Arcade, and farm Souls & Star Power in idle clickers. Don't just play the gameâ€”break the code and ascend.

name: Inotia 4
desc: The grand adventure of Kiyan, assassin of the Dark Clan, and Yusha, saint of light, begins across the vast continent of Inotia. Experience an emotional story and thrilling, action-packed combat!

name: Temple of the Green Moon: Prologue
desc: You're alone. Darkness and hopelessness surround you. These creatures are everywhere. Can you save yourself, or is it all doomed?

name: Airship
desc: Airship is a multiplayer game platform in early development! Play BedWars 2 and other indie games.

name: CivIdle
desc: CivIdle is an idle/incremental game that allows you to lead your own civilization through thousands of years from ancient times to the modern era. Expand your territory, explore a vast tech tree, build various wonders, and trade with global players: empire must grow and numbers must go up!

name: Foobar Zero
desc: Foobar Zero is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter game, with anime characters. Customize your characters with various outfits, create your own loadout with futuristic guns and swords, and dominate your enemies with superior movement!

name: Testimony of Shew: Depths of Sheol
desc: Testimony of Shew is a narrative driven Third-person/Side-scroller platformer, based on a true story, told in symbolism. Traverse through a dark world filled with meaning. Master the art of dodging and perfect your timing as you face increasingly challenging obstacles.

name: Bane of Darkness
desc: In Bohemia's shadows, hunt the Bane of Darkness. Explore, fight, and grow stronger on your quest to rescue your beloved from the wicked vampire lord.

name: Molili AI Friends: Your AI Desk Pal
desc: Bring a charming AI friend to your desktop. Molili AI friend listens, reads by your side, blushes when you care, and helps with study or work using a smart personality system that remembers your moments, growing from curious visitor to the companion who understands you best.

name: Ordy: The Rise of Clara
desc: Imagine a near-future world where the supernatural is the norm. People effortlessly levitate, communicate telepathically, and use telekinesis daily. You play as Clara, an "Ordy" who lost all her abilities in an accident. How do you navigate a world completely unsuited for ordinary people?

name: Monster Ops 13
desc: FREE Season 2 Premiere of Monster Ops! Black Ops soldiers Wraith and Tide know the world is against them, and they can only rely on each other. Two soldiers, forced to go rogue, with a desperate mission. There's no one left they can trust.Â A NSFW Gay Visual Novel Romance Put out in Monthly Episodes!

name: Yuletide Regicide
desc: A dead Santa Claus right before Christmas is never a good sign. Interrogate the North Pole suspects to solve the murder and figure out how to save the festive season in this short dark comedy visual novel whodunnit.

name: Piczle World of Puzzles
desc: All your favourite logic-puzzles in one feature-rich package, Piczle World of Puzzles is the ultimate in picture logic-puzzling!

name: MindEscape
desc: Step into immersive 3D escape rooms and reveal your true self. MindEscape uses cutting-edge AI and scientifically-backed gameplay to assess your personality, problem-solving style, and behavioral patternsâ€”all while having fun

name: Blind Box
desc: Collect blind boxes and unbox them to get cute figurines! Display them in your home and passively earn fame to unlock new decorations! Show off your collection to your friends and unwind!

name: devasion 0.5
desc: Devasion 0.5 â€“ The Intergalactic Upgrade Adventure Steer your spaceship through dangerous galaxies, destroy colored rocks, and collect gadgets to upgrade your ship! Only those who master the right combinations of weapons, colors, and timing will progress.

name: Green Wave
desc: Restore order to chaos in Green Wave, a not so serious traffic management game. Time your traffic lights perfectly to keep the city moving or watch it descend into bumper-to-bumper madness.

name: Killer Chat! - Original Edition
desc: Killer Chat! is a satirical serial killer dating chatsim. Play as a (customisable!) writer as you pretend to be a serial killer, get inspiration for your book, fall in love and try not to call the cops through a whirlwind six months with your murderous beau of choice. What could possibly go wrong?

name: My Sexy Neighbour 2 | Prologue
desc: Before the fame came the thrill. In this provocative prologue to My Sexy Neighbor 2, you take your first steps into a world of voyeurism, dares, and dirty cash. Sneak, stream, seduce â€” and discover how one wild night can change everything.

name: #Oyster Sooource 2120bb
desc: Destruction is Pleasure! Idle, upgrade, and dodge enemies in a Pac-Man-style action game with allies and endless retries.

name: Janky Golf with Stream
desc: A chaotic Twitch integrated mini golf game where your viewers control the shots. Design maps while Twitch chat aims, rotates, and swings using commands or the interactive extension.

name: Bard Idle
desc: Build a unique team, where each character has a random weapon, race and class. Strong combinations of heroes, enhanced by the ballad creation system and jelly dwarfs, will capture your adventure in history!

name: United We Forge
desc: Deep beneath the mountains lies a living forge, where rival creatures â€” Ogres, Goblins, and Amphibians â€” must set aside their grudges to craft powerful gear. In this competitive card strategy game, every card you play shapes the delicate balance between power and collaboration.

name: Tichupro by Spectrum
desc: Enjoy Tichupro, inspired by the famous strategic card game! Play with real users from around the world!

name: WhoIs
desc: A 4-8 player PvP game of deception and paranoia. You have a role, a target, and one mission: eliminate them and escape. Use powerful abilities at the risk of revealing your identity. In this ever-changing arena, hunt or be hunted.

name: Goober Dash
desc: Goober Dash: A 2D platformer battle royale where Goobers Run, Jump & Dash to victory! Customize your Goober, dash to outmaneuver opponents, create your own levels, and compete in global time trials. Unlock exclusive skins and celebrate your wins in this action-packed multiplayer Race Royale!

name: Jackpot.de
desc: Play our prize-winning slots in the best free2play funtime casino out there. The Las Vegas experience of a lifetime awaits you! We've got more than 200 of the best slots and jackpots you can find. You simply won't be able to resist! Our jackpot game offers you fun without end!

name: Money Simulator: Brokeville
desc: Welcome to the Brokeville! Grind your way to the top through jobs, deliveries, bicycle races, and risky crypto trades. Buy, customize, and sell cars & motorcycles for profit. Build your own businesses, manage them, and hire staff to grow your empire.

name: Reign of Guilds
desc: Reign of Guilds â€” the spiritual successor to the old-school fantasy where steel, magic, and skill decide your fate. Inspired by the legacy of Ultima Online and EverQuest.

name: Dilemma Dungeon
desc: A co-op roguelike dungeon exploration game. As you progress with your teammates, you will face dilemma choices where growing stronger yourself means someone else becomes weaker. Each run, you must create builds by combining different maps, classes, skills, and items, and overcome the cursed dungeon.

name: Million Card Game
desc: Compete with 1-5 players in this interactive cozy indie card game! Strategize table layouts and hand placement in order to be the first top win!

name: The Shadow of Shadows
desc: Lilith is a young Shadow that wants to be a Light. She embarks on a journey to learn how Light is made but is about to find out a horrible secret. Will you help her turn the tides?

name: Top Heroes
desc: â—† Embark on an Adventure Explore unknown lands, unlock ancient ruins, and brave dangerous dungeons! â—† Build Your Kingdom Create a thriving realm from scratch and turn your dream city into reality! â—† Achieve Glory with Your Guild Form powerful alliances with players worldwide, and conquer the world!

name: Battle of Goldfish Scooping
desc: "Battle of Goldfish Scooping" is an asymmetrical multiplayer action game. Players take on the roles of scoops and goldfish to aim for high scores. Based on your previous play results, you can acquire skills and enhance parameters to aim for even higher scores!

name: Republic of Jungle
desc: Gather your friends (5 to 10 players) and play as advisors to President Puma. His re-election depends on your loyalty. In a social deduction party game, Leakers try to sneak into missions to leak Puma's secrets- Loyalists try to suss them out. Read the room and bluff your way to a political victory.

name: Stress Relief
desc: Stress Relief is an idler game, which comes with a reliable companion, the Slime! Are you bored? Are you stressed because of work? Come and destroy your desktop with the tools included! Play, earn Pixel Points and get drops every 25 minutes!

name: Tiny Crate
desc: Tiny Crate is a Crate Chucking Action Puzzle Game ! Leap over spikes and stack up crates to reach the portal in each puzzle . Collect hidden musical notes (-:

name: Myrkwood: Offshoot
desc: Myrkwood: Offshoot is a top-down survival defense game that you can play with friends! Defend the Gem as you fight through waves of enemies!

name: Slime Saga
desc: Train slimes, make friends, and get set for adventure! It's time to pick up your slime catcher and become the latest and greatest tamer!

name: Rink Rascals
desc: Dash, steal, and score with up to 6 players on an outdoor hockey rink. Choose your class, customize your gear, battle for the puck, and score epic goals in this fast-paced cartoon-style hockey game full of action.

name: HeXpunk
desc: HexPunk is a co-op, third-person shooter with an emphasis on stylish and fast-paced combat.

name: Fall Asleep
desc: Fall Asleep is a tense first-person climbing game where youâ€™re trapped in a nightmare and the only way out is up. See only the platforms in front of you, make every jump count, and try to escape before the dream swallows you whole.

name: Sunflower Stronghold
desc: Grow Crops, Process Resources and Construct Towers and Defend!

name: Little Smiles Daycare
desc: A short psychological horror experience set inside an abandoned daycare. Explore, uncover hidden notes, solve eerie mysteries, and discover what happened to Little Smiles Daycare, before something finds you first.

name: Ktrl Smash
desc: Krlt Smash is a fast-paced multiplayer arena game where anything can become a weapon. Pick your fighter, grab bats, baseballs, or even chairs, collect stat boosts, and fight to get the most kills before time runs out. Stay alert, keep moving, and defeat as many players as you can.

name: ä»Šå¤œæ— äººå…¥çœ  No One Sleep Tonight
desc: No One Sleep Tonight is a game that focuses on the feeling of Night. You will go through multiple midnight scenes and experience different environments and gameplay, explore this world created by street lamp, moonlight, and wind.

name: SurLeFil
desc: On the Wire is an educational game mixing science, history and humor. Follow ProfFilâ€™s lessons, help Kelhann complete his missions, and discover the wonders of electricity, mechanics, and more.

name: S.P.E.C.T.O.R 01
desc: S.P.E.C.T.O.R 01 is a Third-Person SCI-FI action shooter. You are a soldier in the distant future on a solo rescue mission codenamedÂ S.P.E.C.T.O.R 01. Aliens have taken over certain areas around earth and have taken one of your fellow soldiers hostage. Your task is to bring them to safety.

name: Fruit Fusion!
desc: Help Aira, Rinka and Yuri merge fruit and unlock new cards in this sweet and charming Suika x Deckbuilder!

name: Hivefront TD
desc: Collect your insect army and defend the hive as either Ants or Bees in this awesome tower defense adventure, brought to life with a hand-drawn art style!

name: Supercar Evolution 2025
desc: The first-ever true MMO supercar racing game is here! Play with up to 39 friends!

name: SportsBlitz
desc: SportsBlitz, a retro themed micro game collection of sports games.
developer: Hayden Longfield, Thomas Drage, Blake Cardilini, Jeremiah Franklin, AJ Weston, Luke Woodman

name: Action PUZZLE
desc: Clear as many lines as possible to earn a high score. Blocks will fall in response to your character's movements, so avoid them skillfully.

name: Skybound
desc: Skybound is a 3D exploration platformer focused on fun, fluid movement mechanics, parkour and environmental puzzle solving.

name: SlimyLeap
desc: SlimyLeap is a fast-paced pixel-art infinite runner where you play as a brave little slime trying to go as far as possible without dying.

name: Monstro Maestro
desc: Play as a conductor trapped in a haunted and crazy mansion! As a concert begins, a jealous ghost appears and takes possession of your orchestra. To free them, you must explore every corner of the mansion, complete musical challenges, and rebuild your troupe.

name: The wild darkness
desc: Explore a survival-roguelike RPG set in an unknown and bizarre world. To withstand its many dangers, you'll need to gain new knowledge, scavenge for food, and acquire useful items. Craft, build, and learn your way through a crucial adventure to uncover the world's secrets.

name: Oh Balls Merge
desc: Drop, merge, and score! Immerse yourself in the addictive ball-merging mania of Oh Balls and see how high you can go.

name: Long Knives
desc: An oriental narrative mystery. The story branches upon your choices. The dice lies.

name: å‹‡è€…ä¹‹ç¾ Calamity from the Yongzhe
desc: This is an experimental RPG game. The work tells an adventure story set in a fictional world, revolving around the conflict and journey between the King who unified the world and a brave team of Yongzhe(Hero) on a quest to overthrow him. It's a grand adventure filled with both laughter and tears.

name: Herofrenia Infinite Hyperdeath
notes: Not support English language. (Only Portuguese - Brazil)
desc: Herofrenia Infinite Hyperdeath Ã© um jogo top down shooter do universo do RPG multimidia Herofrenia! Conte com um arsenal variado de armas para compor seu arsenal em um estilo de jogo frenÃ©tico com movimentaÃ§Ã£o veloz, dash e mortes frequentes! Quanto mais sangue as coisas ficam mais lentas ao redor

name: ã‚¨ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³
desc: ç™¾è²¨åº—å·¡å›ãƒ›ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼ã€‚ã‹ã¤ã¦å¥‡å¦™ãªä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•ã§æµè¡Œã—ãŸé®é™å‰¤ã€Œã‚¨ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã€ã€ä¸Šæ˜‡ã‚’ç¶šã‘ã‚‹ã‚¨ãƒ¬ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã€ç•™ã¾ã‚‹æ™‚é–“ã€‚å¤œé–“è­¦å‚™å“¡ã®é’å¹´äºŒåãŒã€ä¸Šéšã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¤ã¤å·¡å›ã—ã€å„ãƒ•ãƒ­ã‚¢ã§ç•°å¸¸äº‹æ…‹ã®çœŸç›¸ã‚’æ¢ã‚‹ã€‚

name: í† ë¼ì˜ ê±°ì§“ë§
desc: Bunny's Lie is a real-time card game based on a moon rabbit in a Korean myth. Your luck doesn't matter in this match. You can win even if you don't have a good hand, if you just have wits and bluffing. Enjoy a fierce battle under the moonlight, with the cute bunnies. (ENG ver will be updated later.)

name: BND-Legenden: Operation Blackbox
desc: BND Legends: Operation Blackbox is a tactical stealth adventure where you guide agent AJ through a fortified tech compound, infiltrate enemy systems, steal critical data, and complete clever minigames with support from your elite BND team.

name: TOREROWA
desc: Explore dungeons in your spare time! Roguelike dungeon RPG with a party of up to 3 players to challenge dungeons!

name: Kando Realm
desc: Journey into the world of Kando. Take on creatures, craft awesome weapons, help villagers and cut down tree's.Â Will you slay your way to the top?Â Or become a master craftsman.Â It's all down to you.

name: ã‚¤ãƒã‚¸ãƒŠãƒªãƒ¼ãƒãƒƒãƒ‰ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ‰
desc: A short visual novel game in which a boy named Shiomi suddenly appears one day, and the protagonist, who recognizes him as an imaginary friend, converses with him to find out what happened between them.

name: Crisis: The Third Way
desc: "Crisis: The Third Way" is a fantastic visual novel set in a world struggling to recover from a devastating financial crisis that led to World War III.

name: GrenzgÃ¤nger - Aus der DDR in den Westen
desc: Jena, GDR. Assel, Michael, and Hanna live in the same neighbourhood and fight against state surveillance. Can they bring about the necessary changes, or will they have to flee? Help them find their way! [Only available in German!]

name: æ¶©æ¶©å‘æŠ–
desc: A horror puzzle exploration game After breaking the lipstick, your wife began to beat you up Explore the house, collect props, avoid the wife who is in a strange state, and finally escape from this white nightmare

name: Poker Fate - ACG Texas Hold'em
desc: Poker Fate is an anime-style Texas Hold'em game featuring beautiful heroines. It combines easy-to-learn tutorials for beginners, high-stakes duels for top players, and a variety of thrilling tournaments. Join now and uncover the cards of your destiny with us!

name: Teddy Knight
desc: Step into the paws of an unlikely hero and journey through the toy chest! In Teddy Knight, a physics-based action roguelite, you play as Teddy, a brave stuffed knight on a mission to save the toy world from evil. Engage in fast-paced combat with unique â€œbounceâ€ mechanics in a dark toy universe.

name: Humanoid
desc: Humanoid is a parody sci-fi arcade-style run-and-gun shoot 'em up in the style of an early 8-bit arcade gameâ€”with the added bonus that you can actually win. To survive, you need to play aggressively: you're rewarded for acting fast and clearing rooms. It is simple to play, difficult to win.

name: Battington Manor
desc: Battington Manor is a kid-friendly VR first-person shooter guided experience where you will embark on a journey through haunted halls shooting evil bats with your holy water blaster and garlic bazooka to save the Battington family!

name: Space Aces
desc: Space Aces is an indie space shooter that plunges you into an online universe full of action, strategy, and fierce competition. Step into the cockpit and evolve from a rookie pilot into the most feared Ace in the galaxy!

name: Diluted
desc: Diluted is a 3/4ths puzzle adventure-action game where nightmares seep into reality. Play as Archie, an orphan bound to a living nightmare, and uncover the truth behind his matronâ€™s orphanage as you explore twisted forests and corrupted memories.

name: Lizards VS Humans
desc: A multiplayer FPS Sci-Fi game set in an alternate reality where reptilian beings battle humans for control of Earth. Features unique species-specific abilities, diverse weapon systems, and tactical gameplay.

name: Jumara
desc: A tactical card game of structure and precision. Build decks, charge Totems, and master the Tox System , a logic-based sequence mechanic that defines every encounter.
